amendment.description: To provide for the funding of education assistance enlistment incentives to facilitate National service through Department of Defense Education Benefits Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 794 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 794 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S6835; text: CR S6835) To provide for the funding of education assistance enlistment incentives to facilitate National service through Department of Defense Education Benefits Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 794 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 794 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
